name: the cursed isles core book
description:
the cursed isles is a simple to use and learn system, made for creativity.

features:

a unique class system called...the affinity pyramid! instead of being forced into set roles like a rogue or a wizard, this system lets you make practically anything for a class! *as long as that thing is two core weapons or magic types, need limits to keep the game somewhat balanced.

13 races each with 2 variants, an alternate version, and an alternate race, for a actual total of 39. they're very diverse, some are very insane, and i can almost guarantee you'll like atleast one! (some even remove stats from your character.)

curses, alot of curses, not the swearing kind.

the ability to make your own magic types! no set magic types*, you make your own!
*there are technically set types but thats because a few races get specific magic types.

lore, kinda, it's not very good.

all written in rtf (rich text documents) for your editing and homebrewing convenience! (i couldn't figure out how to make a pdf)

and, a singular image, art is expensive and hard to make.

is this the best system? probably not. is it a system that'll probably lead to insane stories and campaigns? that's it's intended purpose at very least!
